talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$Geraint$
It would be better if you socialise with other human beings rather than staying here.

$Duke Stuart$
Saint Haven's loyal {user_nick}, did you finish the Court Sorceress Kayleen's request?

$General Douglas$
They are only interested about the Gold Dragon's power instead of our troops whod had make a most contribution in the war for Saint Haven (General Douglas is looking at Duke Stuart unpleasantly.)

$Master Archer Ithilien$
Geraint...... Everyone don't know about him, but I know about him.
He was the one who led us 50 years ago.

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
Whew. What is this? I can almost see my wrinkles.
(Kayleen is putting her hand mirror in her pocket and shakes her hands with an annoyed look.)

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
I need a rest.
Why don't you go talk to Duke Stuart? Because he is staring at us with his slit eyes.

$Geraint$
You are worried about descendant of the Ancients, aren't you? No one can touch her as long as I am still here, do not worry

$General Douglas$
They are only interested about the Gold Dragon's power. Not the troops that made the most contribution to the war for Saint Haven(General Douglas is looking at Duke Stuart unpleasantly.)

$Master Archer Ithilien$
GeraintEveryone do not know who he is but I know him.
He was the one who led us 50 years ago.

$Duke Stuart$
Saint Haven's loyal {user_nick}, welcome.
I was just about to look for you. There is something important..

$Duke Stuart${action:Stand2}
The Gold Dragon... You told me that you called the Gold Dragon as Geraint?
That is a common name, and it was the name of the hero 50 years ago, neverthless we would like to give him a Certificate.

$Duke Stuart$
Yes. Because he was motivated and impressed by our young King's moral. Isn't that a wonderful thing? We are going to publicize this news to people in Saint Haven so that people will be more loyal to the king. Thus we decided to give him an official certificate.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Do you think it's okay to not ask for his confirmation?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Duke Stuart$
Haha. What do mean as misunderstanding?
Well, well, building a descent statue for Guardian of The Nation is also in our discussion.
This must be the glorious moment in his life.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Duke Stuart is giving you the descent certificate.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Duke Stuart$
Ah, that was the reason I was looking for you.
I heard that you are the only one who can enter the place, am I right?
Well, since I am a Duke, it is kind of embarrassing to go there myself anyway, so could you ask him for me as an envoy?

$Duke Stuart${action:Talk}
The fact that the Gold Dragon is our ally, this will inspire our loyalty towards our king.
People, the nobles, and everybody else in Saint Haven will look up at us. Hahaha~

$Duke Stuart$
{user_nick}, go tell the Gold Dragon that I will certify him as a Guardian of Saint Haven in the name of the greatest Cassius king of knight.

$Duke Stuart$
{user_nick}, go tell the Gold Dragon that I will certify him as a Guardian of Saint Haven in the name of the greatest Cassius king of knight.

$Geraint$
A guardian knight? A certificate?
...Are they doing it again?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Are you going to reject their offer?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
It was the same 50 years ago. My colleagues and I were given useless scraps of paper and they wanted to hold meaningless ceremonies.
Elves say that humans are creatures that easily change, but I guess that is not correct.

$Geraint$
Well, it is true that I am actually guarding Saint Haven by creating the Nest. So I don't care what humans are calling me.

$Geraint$
You do whatever you want with it.
I don't need it.

$Geraint$
It seems like that was all of your business.
(Geraint seems like he has no interest in this matter anymore.)

$Geraint$
Well, it is true that I am actually guarding Saint Haven by creating the Nest.
So I don't care what humans are calling me.

$Duke Stuart${action:Talk}
Well, since he want to keep it simple, I can include this in the story and let people know as anImpressive Point.
What a great attitude he has. He is actually helping us to save our treasury. Hahaha.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>So you don't have any other business to take care of, right?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Duke Stuart${action:Stand2}
I am busy estimating the production cost for the statue. So you may go now, but I will call you when I need you.

$Duke Stuart$
Let me think. Ah... Yes I indeed do have one for you..
General Douglas has being sending request for manpower in treating the wounded soldiers.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(The Duke lets out a sigh with making contortions on his face.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Duke Stuart$
Yes, I understand that how much General Douglas contributed from this war. But at the end, isn't everything settled under our king's royal grace?
Doesn't he had Elite Soldiers asistant, yet he still keep seeking reinforcement

$Duke Stuart${action:Stand2}
Since it's kind of rude if I completely ignore him, I would like to go there.
If he needs something that you think it is necessary, then get it for him.

$Duke Stuart${action:Stand2}
General Douglas is keep sending a request about a manpower shortage on treating the injured soldiers.
Could you go there? Because I have other things to do.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I heard that you sent a request for the manpower.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$General Douglas${action:Talk}
Oh oh, {user_nick}, nice to see you again. I'd like to thank you for the last time.
Our troops got motivated by your bravery when you were in battle.

$General Douglas$
Did you come here for support? Ugh...
They are not even thinking about sending a official manager.
This is not good because this is an urgent issue...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>It sounds like it is an urgent problem.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$General Douglas$
Because the Gold Dragon's appearance, all of our troops' contribution became useless.
But more importantly, the main problem is our injured troops. Because injured troops are not getting enough support from the Royal Castle.

$General Douglas${action:Talk}
I am worried because many troops are getting Strange Symptoms. We need to find out the real reason behind the sympton, but we need someone to help us with it. Knowing it would allow us to provide them the right treatment.

$General Douglas$
Really? That is very nice of you! And I feel sorry for seeking your help despite you not belonging to the Royal Castle.
Currently, Master Archer Ithilien is helping us on treating the injured soldiers. You should go up to her and listen to the details.

$General Douglas${action:Talk}
Currently Master Archer Ithilien is the one helping us on treating the injured soldiers. You should find her to get more informations
Ias the days pass I am more worried as more soldiers are having that symptoms.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Does it has to be a manager to take care of this?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Master Archer Ithilien$
I sent a request saying that I want managers.
How come you, {user_class} are here alone?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Therefore, I would like to hear about the strange symptoms.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Master Archer Ithilien$
Well, not really...
But I think those people in the Royal Castle are misunderstanding the priority that what need to be done first.
Well, I guess that is their choice but its also their destiny.

$Master Archer Ithilien$
Clerics are confused by the symptons on some of the troops from the war, as it is something they never see before.
But somehow the symptoms are not strange to me.
I am not sure exactly... But I think I know that symptoms.

$Master Archer Ithilien$
If my assumption is correct, the symptoms that have strangely a high fever and physical body parts that affected by mutation are... (lthilien is unforthcoming about the answer.)
...I still need to confirm a bit more.
I would like to ask you a favor for that.

$Master Archer Ithilien$
Our troops are still dispatched to defeat the remaining monsters at Dark Overlord Training Ground .
I would like you to go there and defeat monsters and collect Contaminated Soil Sample for me.

$Master Archer Ithilien$
You will see quite a lot of remaining monsters at Dark Overlord Training Ground .
If you investigate the Soil Sample that attached from monsters body, you will be able to achieve the information.

$Master Archer Ithilien$
The Contaminated Soil Sample that you brought is in bad condition, so I am afraid it's not very practical.
I am sorry but could you get me the sample that attached from Stronger Monster?

$Master Archer Ithilien$
Have you not found the Comtaminated Soil Sample yet?
Please hurry for our injured soldiers.

$Master Archer Ithilien$
Oh! You are here. I feel more comfortable asking you a favor than managers at the Royal Castle.
Because people at the Royal Castle do not know what are they supposed to do as a first priority.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Are you talking about the incident 50 years ago?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Master Archer Ithilien$
This color of mud must be...
(lthilien is looking at the sample minutely.)
As I expected, I was right.
The contamination is almost same as the contamination incident we had 50 years ago.

$Master Archer Ithilien$
The incident, Rain of Plague and the blood of Black Dragon...
50 years ago, we found a lot of victims even after ending of Dragon's Raid.

$Master Archer Ithilien$
Yes, the blood of Black Dragon. The powerful monsters' blood is poison to others. It dissolves people's physical body like the lava volcano and moreover, it eats people's mind.
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

journal.title: Other Business
journal.contents:
It seems like Duke Stuart is looking for you. Go meet him.

Saint Haven Royal Castle → Duke Stuart

journal.title: Certificate Conferment
journal.contents:
It seems like Duke Stuart is publicizing to people by using Geraint. Deliver the certificate to Geraint.

Saint Haven(Underground Secret Region) → Geraint
journal.todo_msg: Please deliver the certificate of Duke Stuart to Geraint.

journal.title: Things that have no interest
journal.contents:
Geraint has no interest on humans work. Anyway, you delivered the certificate to him so return to Duke Stuart.

Saint Haven(Underground Secret Region) → Duke Stuart
journal.todo_msg: You have been delivered the certificate. Please report to Duke Stuart.

journal.title: General's Complaint
journal.contents:
General Douglas is looking for someone who can help on treating the injured soldiers. Go meet General Douglas.

Saint Haven Royal Castle → General Douglas

journal.title: A Substantive Supporter
journal.contents:
Talk to Master Archer Ithilien who is helping on treating the injured soldiers.

Saint Haven Royal Castle → Master Archer Ithilien
journal.todo_msg: Please talk to Master Archer Ithilien about injured soliders support.

journal.title: Contaminated Soil Sample
journal.contents:
Go to Forsaken Islet and collect contaminated soil sample from the monster. You can get it by hunting the monsters.
Hermalte Port (Charter Ship) → Forsaken Islet Core
journal.todo_msg: Please collect contaminated soil sample at Forsaken Islet Core.

journal.title: Collection Complete
journal.contents:
You have finished collecting the samples. Report to Master Archer Ithilien.

Saint Haven → Master Archer Ithilien
journal.todo_msg: You have been collected the sample. Please report to Master Archer Ithilien.
